results.title: Determination of the antibacterial activity of simvastatin against periodontal pathogens, Porphyromonas gingivalis and Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans: An in vitro study
results.text_hl: Hence @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can be prescribed as a dual action drug in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with both @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Periodontal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010510 @@@periodontal disease@@@.
